exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="DDZBackButtonUI" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="70" height="48">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             source.down="btn_back_on@2x_png" source="btn_back@2x_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0xf9ef44" text=""/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DDZGrayPopupCloseButtonUI" width="58" height="58" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Button id="closeButton" label="" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_gray_popup_close@2x_png" source.down="btn_gray_popup_close_on@2x_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DDZTransparentCoverUI" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.4" strokeAlpha="0.4"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="QPAlertUI" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<ns1:DDZTransparentCover x="0" y="0" skinName="DDZTransparentCoverUI"/>
	<e:Group id="popupGroup" width="572" height="338" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" fillColor="0xffffff" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" ellipseHeight="30" ellipseWidth="30"/>
		<e:Label id="titleLabel" text="" horizontalCenter="0" top="38" textColor="0x000000" size="36"/>
		<e:Label id="messageLabel" text="无法连接到服务器" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0x882f00" verticalCenter="-29" size="30" width="500"/>
		<e:Group id="cancelAndOkGroup" width="519" height="95" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="25" visible="false">
			<e:Button id="cancelAndOkGroupCancelButton" label="" horizontalCenter="-127" x="29" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_alert_cancel@2x_png" source.down="btn_alert_cancel_on@2x_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Button id="cancelAndOkGroupOkButton" label="" horizontalCenter="127" x="283" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" verticalCenter="0">
				<e:skinName>
					<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_alert_ok@2x_png" source.down="btn_alert_ok_on@2x_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="okGroup" width="200" height="100" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="25" visible="false">
			<e:Button id="okButton" label="" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
				<e:skinName>
					<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_alert_ok@2x_png" source.down="btn_alert_ok_on@2x_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="QPLoadingUI" width="750" height="1334" currentState="rotate" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" states="rotate" >
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="loadingAnimationGroup">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{circleImage}">
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{90}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{180}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{270}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{360}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{spadeImage}">
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{-1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Rect fillAlpha="0.3" strokeAlpha="0.3" width="100%" height="100%" fillColor="0x000000" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Group id="animationGroup" height="300" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0" width="300">
		<e:Image id="circleImage" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-25" width.rotate="106" height.rotate="108" x.rotate="97" y.rotate="71" source="img_loading_circle@2x_png"/>
		<e:Image id="spadeImage" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-25" width="43" height="44" source="img_loading_spade@2x_png"/>
		<e:Label id="messageLabel" text="努力加载中..." textColor="0xe5dfdf" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="66"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:BasicLayout/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="QPToastUI" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="messageBackground" width="200" height="40" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" fillAlpha="0.9" strokeAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0x464646" ellipseHeight="10" ellipseWidth="10"/>
	<e:Label id="messageLabel" text="连接网络中" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="26" bold="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameLaunchProgressUI" width="650" height="50" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="650" height="50" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="bg_progress_bar@2x_png" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="33" x="8" y="4" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="633" source="fg_progress_bar@2x_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="99%" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-4" textColor="0x8c3d11" size="28"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="UserDashboardUI" width="500" height="150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Button id="signInButton" label="" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_log_in@2x_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="startButton" label="" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_start@2x_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DDZPlayGameTopToolbarUI" width="400" height="150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="widthLabel" text="" x="200" y="110"/>
	<e:Label id="heightLabel" text="" x="308" y="110"/>
	<e:Button id="closeButton" label="" x="308" y="20">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_close_game@2x_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameLaunchSceneUI" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="bg_launch_game@2x_jpg"/>
	<e:Label id="descriptionLabel" text="资源载入中..." bottom="90" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0xaaaaaa"/>
	<e:ProgressBar id="progress" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="20" value="0" skinName="GameLaunchProgressUI"/>
	<ns1:UserDashboard id="userDashboard" skinName="UserDashboardUI" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="240"/>
	<ns1:DDZPlayGameTopToolbar id="topToolbar" skinName="DDZPlayGameTopToolbarUI" right="0" top="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="GetVerificationCodeButtonUI" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="btn_obtain@2x_png"
             source.down="btn_obtain@2x_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="24"
             verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0x1fb6fb"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GetVerificationCodeTimerUI" width="200" height="50" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="timerLabel" text="58秒后重新获取" size="26" textColor="0xaaaaaa" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PhoneTextInputUI" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" ellipseHeight="20" ellipseWidth="20" fillColor="0xdcdcdc"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="30" size="28" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="30" size="28" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" text=""/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="InputPhoneUI" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<ns1:DDZTransparentCover x="0" y="0" skinName="DDZTransparentCoverUI"/>
	<e:Group width="560" height="360" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="bg_phone_sign_in@2x_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Group width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:Label text="获取验证码" x="-32" y="0" textColor="0x000000" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" size="32"/>
			<e:Label text="请输入您的手机号" x="-22" y="10" textColor="0x000000" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="480" textAlign="left" size="28"/>
			<e:TextInput id="phoneInput" x="119" y="99" skinName="PhoneTextInputUI" width="480" height="68"/>
			<e:Button id="nextButton" label="" x="239" y="267">
				<e:skinName>
					<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_next@2x_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="contentJustify" gap="30" paddingTop="20" paddingBottom="20"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="VerificationCodeTextInputUI" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*" width="480" height="68">
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" ellipseHeight="20" ellipseWidth="20" fillColor="0xdcdcdc"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="30" size="28" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="30" size="28" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" text=""/>
	<e:Button id="getVerificationCodeButton" label="重新获取" skinName="GetVerificationCodeButtonUI" height="46" width="114" right="10" verticalCenter="0">
	</e:Button>
	<ns1:GetVerificationCodeTimerView id="timerView" skinName="GetVerificationCodeTimerUI" verticalCenter="0" right="10" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="InputVerificationCodeUI" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<ns1:DDZTransparentCover skinName="DDZTransparentCoverUI" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group width="560" height="406" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="bg_phone_sign_in@2x_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="100%" height="100%"/>
		<e:Group width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:Label text="验证码已发送" x="250" y="63" textColor="0x000000" size="36" fontFamily="Arial"/>
			<e:Group width="480" height="70" x="164" y="121">
				<e:Label id="descriptionLabel" text="已发送到：13111111111" x="0" y="110" textColor="0x000000" size="26" width="480" textAlign="left" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" height="30" verticalAlign="middle"/>
				<e:Label text="请输入您收到的验证码" x="0" y="110" textColor="0x000000" size="26" width="480" textAlign="left" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" verticalAlign="middle" height="30"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout gap="10"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
			<ns1:VerificationCodeTextInput id="verificationCodeInput" width="480" height="68" x="67" y="215" skinName="VerificationCodeTextInputUI"/>
			<e:Button id="okButton" label="" x="237" y="259">
				<e:skinName>
					<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_ok@2x_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout gap="30" horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" paddingTop="20" paddingBottom="20"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DDZCallLandlordButtonsUI" width="750" height="104" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Button id="buJiaoButton" label="" verticalCenter="0" left="0" x="0" y="10" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_not_call_landlord@2x_png" source.down="btn_not_call_landlord_on@2x_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="callOnePointButton" label="" x="190" y="10" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_call_landlord_1@2x_png" source.down="btn_call_landlord_1_on@2x_png" source.disabled="btn_call_landlord_1_disable@2x_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="callTwoPointButton" label="" x="200" y="20" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_call_landlord_2@2x_png" source.down="btn_call_landlord_2_on@2x_png" source.disabled="btn_call_landlord_2_disable@2x_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="callThreePointButton" label="" x="210" y="30" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_call_landlord_3@2x_png" source.down="btn_call_landlord_3_on@2x_png" source.disabled="btn_call_landlord_3_disable@2x_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" gap="10"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DDZMustPlayCardButtonsUI" width="750" height="104" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Group id="buttonsGroup" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Button id="hintButton" label="" x="329" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_hint@2x_png" source.down="btn_hint_on@2x_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="playButton" label="" x="711" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_play@2x_png" source.down="btn_play_on@2x_png" source.disabled="btn_play_disable@2x_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" gap="10"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DDZNoBiggerCardsButtonsUI" width="980" height="104" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Group id="buttonsGroup" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Button id="noBiggerCardsButton" label="" x="34" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_yao_bu_qi@2x_png" source.down="btn_yao_bu_qi_on@2x_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" gap="20"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DDZPlayCardButtonsUI" width="980" height="104" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Group id="buttonsGroup" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Button id="notPlayButton" label="" x="34" verticalCenter="0" y="10" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_not_play@2x_png" source.down="btn_not_play_on@2x_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="hintButton" label="" x="34" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_hint@2x_png" source.down="btn_hint_on@2x_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="playButton" label="" x="34" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_play@2x_png" source.down="btn_play_on@2x_png" source.disabled="btn_play_disable@2x_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:layout>

<e:Skin class="DDZPlayGameSceneUI" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="leftCardsAnimation">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{leftPlayerPlayCardsGroup}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{0.1}" scaleY="{0.1}" y="{98}" x="{124}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="250" ease="quadOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1}" scaleY="{1}" y="{133}" x="{154}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="rightCardsAnimation">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{rightPlayerPlayCardsGroup}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object y="{97}" scaleX="{0.1}" scaleY="{0.1}" x="{945}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="250" ease="quadInOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1}" scaleY="{1}" y="{133}" x="{574.32}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<w:Config id="15a1cf9b826"/>
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="bg_play_game@2x_jpg"/>
	<ns1:DDZPlayerView id="rightPlayerView" skinName="DDZPlayerUI" right="20" top="200" scaleX="1"/>
	<ns1:DDZPlayerView id="leftPlayerView" skinName="DDZPlayerUI" left="20" top="200"/>
	<ns1:DDZPlayerView id="bottomPlayerView" left="20" bottom="20" skinName="DDZPlayerUI"/>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

	<e:Image id="img_disabled" width="100%" height="100%" includeIn="disabled" right="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DDZUserInfoAvatarUI" width="163" height="163" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="avatarImage" source="img_userinfo_default_avatar@2x_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="100%" height="100%"/>
	<e:Button id="avatarButton" label="" width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="img_userinfo_avatar_border@2x_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DDZUserInfoGameDataUI" width="200" height="50" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">

		<e:Label id="valueLabel" text="118" size="25" verticalCenter="0" left="96" textAlign="left" x="96" y="13" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" textColor="0xfcefe8"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="DDZUserInfoNameInputUI" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="540" height="56">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" source="bg_userinfo_textinput@2x_png"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="40"
	                textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="50%" size="25"  textColor="0x8f7c69" text="" verticalAlign="middle"/>
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="40"
	                width="100%" height="50%" size="25" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" textColor="0xc4b5a5" text="" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"/>
	<e:Button id="cleanButton" label="" verticalCenter="0" right="10">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_userinfo_textinput_clean@2x_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DDZUserInfoPopupUI" width="750" height="500" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" source="bg_userinfo@2x_png"/>
	<ns1:DDZUserInfoAvatar id="userAvatar" skinName="DDZUserInfoAvatarUI" left="35" top="86"/>
	<e:Group id="basicInfoGroup" width="500" height="160" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" right="20" top="94">
		<e:Group width="100%" height="30" horizontalCenter="0" top="0">
			<e:Label id="nameLabel" text="会跳的小恐龙" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" size="32" left="0" top="10" x="-8" y="6" textColor="0x79614c"/>
			<ns1:DDZUserInfoGenderView id="genderView" x="197" skinName="DDZUserInfoGenderUI" top="22"/>
			<e:Button id="editUsernameButton" label="" top="10" right="60">
				<e:skinName>
					<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_userinfo_edit@2x_png" source.down="btn_userinfo_edit_on@2x_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="15" horizontalAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Label id="idLabel" text="ID: 1001111" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" size="27" left="0" top="49" textColor="0xbf9d75"/>
		<e:Button id="bindPhoneButton" label="" right="23" verticalCenter="-16.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_userinfo_bind@2x_png" source.down="btn_userinfo_bind_on@2x_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="userDataGroup" width="765" height="120" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="163" visible="false">
		<ns1:DDZUserInfoGameDataView id="totalGame" width="200" height="50" skinName="DDZUserInfoGameDataUI" bottom="205" horizontalCenter="-262" x="32" y="-6" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:DDZUserInfoGameDataView id="winningRate" width="200" height="50" skinName="DDZUserInfoGameDataUI" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="205" x="294" y="-6" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:DDZUserInfoGameDataView id="escapeRate" width="200" height="50" skinName="DDZUserInfoGameDataUI" horizontalCenter="262" bottom="205" x="556.0000000000001" y="-6" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:DDZUserInfoGameDataView id="winningAmount" width="200" height="50" skinName="DDZUserInfoGameDataUI" bottom="157" horizontalCenter="-262" x="32" y="42.00000000000006" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:DDZUserInfoGameDataView id="continueWinningAmount" width="200" height="50" skinName="DDZUserInfoGameDataUI" bottom="157" horizontalCenter="0" x="294" y="42.00000000000006" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:TileLayout horizontalGap="80" orientation="rows" horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" verticalGap="5"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<ns1:DDZPopupCloseButton id="closeButton" skinName="DDZGrayPopupCloseButtonUI" right="14" top="6"/>
</e:Skin>
